msg.desc: Label to the right of the video title indicating who it is by.
msg.name: CHANNEL_BYLINE

msg.desc: Label of close button
msg.name: CLOSE

msg.desc: User choice ads: the header text to help users to make choice
msg.name: DEF_AD_BREAKS

msg.desc: Message shown before we allow users to skip the ad
msg.name: PRE_SKIP_AD

messages.msg: Vous pourrez ignorer cette annonce dans 1.

msg.desc: Message informing user that an ad will close in a number of seconds.
msg.name: CLOSE_IN

messages.msg: La publicité se fermera automatiquement dans 1

msg.desc: Label of recall_advertiserment button
msg.name: RECALL_ADVERTISEMENT

msg.desc: Label of skip_ad button
msg.name: SKIP_AD

msg.desc: A warning message to the user that if they don't make any choice in a certain amount of time a default action will be made. The string is the first line of text and the second line contains the time left (i.e. if no choice has been made, your video will play with standard breaks in [new line] 00:30)
msg.name: TIMEOUT_WARN

messages.msg: En l'absence de choix de votre part, votre vidéo sera lue avec des pauses standards dans

msg.desc: User_choice ads: the header text to help user to make choice
msg.name: WATCH_UNINTERRUPTED

messages.msg: Visionner la vidéo 1sans interruption2 après avoir choisi une annonce :

msg.desc: User choice ads: separates ads button from default button (i.e. press ad or press default)
msg.name: OR

msg.desc: Attributes content as an advertisement.
msg.name: ADVERTISEMENT

msg.desc: Clickable text that indicates that the user can learn more about the advertisement by clicking.
msg.name: LEARN_MORE

msg.desc: User watches a video to completion. The title of the video will follow on the next line.
msg.name: YOU_JUST_WATCHED

messages.msg: Vidéo que vous venez de visionner :

msg.desc: User was shown a video ad and chose not to watch it. The title of the video will follow on the next line.
msg.name: YOU_WERE_SHOWN

msg.desc: Clickable text that allows the user to skip the current video advertisement in order to get to their content video.
msg.name: SKIP_TO_VIDEO

msg.desc: Unclickable text that indicates that the user will be able to skip the current video advertisement in order to get to their content video in some duration of time.
msg.name: YOU_CAN_SKIP_TO_VIDEO_IN

messages.msg: Vous pourrez passer à la vidéo dans 1

msg.desc: Clickable text that allows the user to skip the current video advertisement.
msg.name: SKIP_AD_SIMPLE

msg.desc: Attributes a video to the video uploader's display user name. Display below the video title.
msg.name: BY

msg.desc: Clickable text that takes the user to the advertiser's page.
msg.name: VISIT_ADVERTISERS_SITE

msg.desc: Clickable text that allows user to the share ad to other users.
msg.name: SHARE_TEXT

msg.desc: Clickable text that allows the user to retrieve a new question within a survey, discarding the current one.
msg.name: ANOTHER_QUESTION

msg.desc: Clickable text that allows the user to submit a set of selected answers to a question.
msg.name: SUBMIT_ANSWER

msg.desc: Clickable text that clears answers selected above it when clicked.
msg.name: RESET_CHOICES

msg.desc: Short question to the user about whether they would like to see similar ads in the future. Prompted during ad playback.
msg.name: SHOW_ME_ADS_LIKE_THIS

messages.msg: Aimeriez-vous voir d'autres annonces de ce type ?

msg.desc: Short positive answer to whether or not a user would like to see similar ads.
msg.name: YES

msg.desc: Short negative answer to whether or not a user would like to see similar ads.
msg.name: NO

msg.desc: Short thank you after user responds that they would like to see similar ads.
msg.name: THANKS_GLAD_YOU_LIKE_IT

messages.msg: Merci ! Nous sommes heureux de vous présenter des annonces qui vous plaisent.

msg.desc: Short response after a user responds that they would not like to see similar ads.
msg.name: SORRY_FEEDBACK_IMPROVES_ADS

messages.msg: Nous sommes désolés. Nous tiendrons compte de votre opinion afin d'améliorer la qualité des annonces diffusées sur YouTube.

msg.desc: User hovers over an icon which then shows them information about how to find more information about their ad settings.
msg.name: AD_SETTINGS_INFO

messages.msg: Reportez-vous à la page 1Paramètres des annonces2 de Google pour en savoir plus sur la manière dont les annonces sont ciblées ou pour désactiver la diffusion d'annonces personnalisées.
